text:
Ronald Charles "Ron" Marlenee (August 8, 1935 – April 26, 2020) was an American Republican politician. He was in the United States House of Representatives from Montana between January 3, 1977 to January 3, 1993. He represented. Marlenee was born in Scobey, Montana.
Marlenee died on April 26, 2020 in Bozeman, Montana of a short-illness, aged 84.
